messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Anyone in PA?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Hi Michelle, Since this is an international list, local questions are best asked on your state homeschooling list where there should be unschoolers to
messages.messageBody:
On May 7, 2012, at 4:24 PM, michele wrote:

> My question is this-PA is rather strict about requirements for portfolios,
> etc and wondered what you include in your portfolios to satisfy the requirements?

Hi Michelle,

Since this is an international list, local questions are best asked on your state homeschooling list where there should be unschoolers to answer any state based questions. Check here:

http://sandradodd.com/world#us

There's also:

http://www.nhen.org/home.html
http://homeschooling.gomilpitas.com/

Joyce

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Anyone in PA?
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! My name is Michele and I have four children.  We ve been doing cyber for three years now but I plan on Unschooling after this year.  My question is this-PA
messages.messageBody:
Hi! My name is Michele and I have four children. We've been doing cyber for three years now but I plan on Unschooling after this year. My question is this-PA is rather strict about requirements for portfolios, etc and wondered what you include in your portfolios to satisfy the requirements?
Thanks for any input
